verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> But, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> me, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> for they will <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> is that in your <S%H3027>hand?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> A <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7993>Cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground.<s%> And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7971>Put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H270>take<s%> it by the <S%H2180>tail.<s%> And he <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2388>caught<s%> it, and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4294>rod<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand:<s%>

That they may <S%H539>believe<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore<s%> to him, <S%H935>Put<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> into your <S%H2436>bosom.<s%> And he <S%H935>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom:<s%> and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it out, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H6879>leprous<s%> as <S%H7950>snow.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%> And he <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again;<s%> and <S%H3318>plucked<s%> it out of his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> as his other <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H226>sign,<s%> that they will <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H226>sign.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H226>signs,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> that you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> it on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land: and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3947>take<s%> out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H3006>dry<s%> land.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O my <S%H136>LORD,<s%> I am not <S%H376>eloquent,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H8543>heretofore,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H227>since<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant:<s%> but I am <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H6310>speech,<s%> and of a <S%H3515>slow<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H483>dumb,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H6493>seeing,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5787>blind?<s%> have not I the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>
<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3212>go,<s%> and I will be with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> you shall <S%H1696>say.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> O my <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H7971>send,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him whom you will <S%H7971>send.<s%>

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is not <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> your <S%H251>brother?<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he can <S%H1696>speak<s%> well. And <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> you: and when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> you, he will be <S%H8056>glad<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> and I will be with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and with his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>
And he shall be your <S%H1696>spokesman<s%> to the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and he shall be, even he shall be to you instead of a <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and you shall be to him instead of <S%H430>God.<s%>
And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H226>signs.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Let me <S%H3212>go,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5750>whether<s%> they be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%> And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H4191>dead<s%> which <S%H1245>sought<s%> your <S%H5315>life.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7392>set<s%> them on an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> When you <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that he shall not let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>
And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is my <S%H1121>son,<s%> even my <S%H1060>firstborn:<s%>

And I <S%H559>say<s%> to you, Let my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that he may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me: and if you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to let him <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H2026>slay<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> even your <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H4411>inn,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6298>met<s%> him, and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> him.

Then <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6864>sharp<s%> <S%H6697>stone,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5060>cast<s%> it at his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> a <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H2860>husband<s%> are you to me.
So he let him <S%H7503>go:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> A <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H2860>husband<s%> you are, because of the <S%H4139>circumcision.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> And he <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H6298>met<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H539>believed:<s%> and when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that he had <S%H7200>looked<s%> on their <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> then they <S%H6915>bowed<s%> their heads and <S%H7812>worshipped.<s%>
